channel.title: computer science on Lambda Land
channel.description: Recent content in computer science on Lambda Land

item.title: Complete and Liveness, Safe and Sound
item.description: I have a hard time keeping these terms straight: liveness vs. safety soundness vs. completeness This is intended as a short guide for myself; maybe someone else will find it useful too! Note that this is all to the best of my knowledge and understanding at the present time; if there be faults, they be the faults of myself. I welcome correction and clarification if I am wrong. Liveness vs. Safety Liveness and safety deal with properties of a system.

item.title: Control-Flow Analysis
item.description: Control-Flow Analysis is a popular technique for performing static analysis of many different kinds of programming languages. It’s most often needed in cases where you have some kind of dynamic dispatch: either where you have first-class functions or when you have objects and you call one of their methods.
